entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
